title: What To Expect From Fed This Week and How To Tweak Your Bond Portfolio
description: Barron’s associate editor Reshma Kapadia and Sonal Desai, chief investment officer for Franklin Templeton Fixed Income and Barron's Roundtable member, discuss the Fed's next moves, how to tweak bond portfolios now and the opportunity in municipal bonds.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
